title: Ich Liebedich – The Love of the Demon King Who Destroyed the World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Mystery   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Demon Lord   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Heroes   Lovers Reunited   Magic   Multiple Transported Individuals   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic
author: Asagi Kana   あさぎ　かな
description:
Two people who were transferred from another world and reincarnated at the same time.

She is a Hero and I am the Demon King.

What truth will be revealed in the final battle between the Hero and the Demon King?>
